sentence.Network_en: He found no evidence of collusion between record companies and retailers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他没发现唱片公司与零售商串通一气的证据。

sentence.Network_en: The police were corrupt and were operating in collusion with the drug dealers.
sentence.Network_cn: 警察腐败，与那伙毒品贩子内外勾结。

sentence.Network_en: They secretly entered into collusion with the northern warlords.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们喑中和北洋军阀勾结起来.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin collusio(n-), from colludere 'have a secret agreement' (see collude)

entry.tran: (尤指国家、组织间的)共谋，勾结，串通
entry.def: Collusion is secret or illegal co-operation, especially between countries or organizations.

example.ex: He found no evidence of collusion between record companies and retailers...
example.tran: 他没发现唱片公司与零售商串通一气的证据。

example.ex: Some stockbrokers, in collusion with bank officials, obtained large sums of money for speculation.
example.tran: 一些股票经纪人和银行职员串通一气，通过炒买炒卖赚了不少钱。

auth_sentence.content: She was training herself to scorn his collusion.
auth_sentence.res_content: She was training herself to scorn his collusion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She was training herself to scorn his collusion.

auth_sentence.content: But military collusion with the cartels runs deep and wide.
auth_sentence.res_content: But military collusion with the cartels runs deep and wide.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But military collusion with the cartels runs deep and wide.

auth_sentence.content: Blanche has been sacrificed to the Kowalskis' desire and collusion.

sentences.en: The officials are in collusion with the criminals.
They secretly entered into collusion with the northern warlords.
sentences.cn: 他们喑中和北洋军阀勾结起来。

sentences.en: We declared against the draft resolution put forward by the member states in collusion with the aggressor.
sentences.cn: 我们声明反对那些与侵略者勾结在一起的成员国提出的决议草案。
